divs: Sighting DetailsI was driving along to meet a friend at a movie. It was dark and it was suburbs. Stars in the sky and a clear night. I noticed what I thought might be a plane moving along the same direction and seemingly same speed as I am. It was way up in the sky. I came to a stop light and looked up. The plane stopped when I stopped. I gasped in disbelief and the object I thought was a plane bolted straight up into the sky from where I was and disappeared. I thought lots of things, but never tried to get confirmation ... I tried to talk myself out of thinking I saw what I thought I saw. I'm still a little unsure, but it just doesn't seem normal the way it all happened.
Object Flight Path: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
trends: there have been 3 other sightings in cms\tg n\a
there were no other sightings in cms\tg n\a on or around november 30th 1991
